com.github.luka5w.fileserver.data

Class UserDB.UserData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.luka5w.fileserver.data.datatypes.User
      • com.github.luka5w.fileserver.data.UserDB.UserData
  • Enclosing class:
    UserDB

    public class UserDB.UserData
extends User
    A datatype containing all userdata.

    This datatype contains sensitive user information and must not be published!
    The password is never stored raw anywhere but in hashed form using my HashedPassword datatype.
